greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle where the n-th row lists the integers k between 1 and n ordered by increasing value of sigma(k)/k where sigma is the sum of divisors, A000203.
link: Michel Marcus, Rows n = 1..100 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{t = Table[0, {n}], j, k}, For[j = 1, j <= n, j++, t[[j]] = {}; For[k = 1, k <= j, k++, AppendTo[t[[j]], DivisorSigma[1, k]/k]]]; Ordering /@ t]; f@ 13 // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 29 2015 *)
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, v = vector(n, k, sigma(k)/k); w = vecsort(v,,1); for (k=1, n, print1(w[k], ", ")); print(););}
results.author: _Michel Marcus_, Mar 29 2015
